title: President Donald J. Trump’s 500 Days of Making the Government Accountable to the American People – The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			
Issued on:
June 6, 2018
All Americans deserve accountability and respect — and that is what we are giving them.
						President Donald J. Trump					REFORMING BUREAUCRACY: Through Civil Service and VA reforms, President Donald J. Trump is refocusing the Federal workforce and increasing its accountability to taxpayers.RETURNING CHOICE TO HEALTHCARE: President Trump’s actions on healthcare have increased options for Americans and returned decision-making about healthcare to individuals. EXPANDING LIBERTY: The President has appointed judges who faithfully apply the law and is working with State, local, and Tribal leaders to combat government overreach.
